Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
FileUtils
public class FileUtils extends Object
Provides utility methods for reading from and writing to text files. Handles basic file I/O operations with error logging.

  • Method Details

    • appendToFile

      public static void appendToFile(String filename, String content)
      Appends content to a text file. Creates the file if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      filename - Path/name of the file to modify
      content - The text content to append

    • readFile

      public static List<String> readFile(String filename)
      Reads all lines from a text file.
      Parameters:
      filename - Path/name of the file to read
      Returns:
      List of strings representing each line in the file. Returns empty list if file doesn't exist or read fails.
